DIQ010.label: Doctor told you have diabetes
DIQ010.text: The next questions are about specific medical conditions. {Other than during pregnancy, {have you/has SP}/{Have you/Has SP}} ever been told by a doctor or health professional that {you have/{he/she/SP} has} diabetes or sugar diabetes?
DIQ010.target: Both males and females 1 YEAR - 150 YEARS

DID040.label: Age when first told you had diabetes
DID040.text: How old {was SP/were you} when a doctor or other health professional first told {you/him/her} that {you/he/she} had diabetes or sugar diabetes?
DID040.target: Both males and females 1 YEAR - 150 YEARS

DIQ160.label: Ever told you have prediabetes
DIQ160.text: {Have you/Has SP} ever been told by a doctor or other health professional that {you have/SP has} any of the following: prediabetes, impaired fasting glucose, impaired glucose tolerance, borderline diabetes or that {your/her/his} blood sugar is higher than normal but not high enough to be called diabetes or sugar diabetes?
DIQ160.target: Both males and females 1 YEAR - 150 YEARS

DIQ050.label: Taking insulin now
DIQ050.target: Both males and females 1 YEAR - 150 YEARS

DIQ070.label: Taking diabetes pills to lower blood sugar
DIQ070.text: Are you now taking diabetic pills to lower your blood sugar? These are sometimes called oral agents or oral hypoglycemic agents.
DIQ070.target: Both males and females 1 YEAR - 150 YEARS
